column5: Dr. Clarence Beche (Genome UK),Prof. Clifford Stewart (Devon University),Dr. Ivan Walker (Atlantic Genomic Research)
column6:
Describe the differences in foetal growth and birth weight between ethnic groups. Investigate the causes of low birth weight in babies of South Asian origin. Study the effects of diet in pregnancy on growth and development.
Explore the effect of exposure to chemicals during pregnancy on growth and development.

column4: Dr. Walter Armstrong (Universidad de Costa Rica)
column5: Dr. Louis Alvarez (Universidad de Costa Rica)
column6: To provide essential information on the demography, health status, and fertility status.
The objective of the project is to collect blood samples from adults to provide specimens for a serum bank and collect data on known and suspected risk factors for cancer.

column5: Prof. Florence Bell (Université de Liège),Prof. Clifford Stewart (Devon University)
column6: To provide the capacity and a database to support more advanced community-based studies and field trials in the future.

column4: Dr. Tanya Barbosa (University of Cambridge),Dr. Eugene Steno (Tyrell Institute),Mr. David Johnston (Helena Genomics)
column6: To serve as a sentinel field site providing accurate information on the population dynamics of rural communities, to inform the evolution of rural health and development policy.
